channel.title: What is the point of a compiler
channel.description: What is the point of a compiler and i think mines messed up it says "3 errors press and key to continue" on mine can i get a code to get another on....and what is the point of haveing one what do they do.

item.title: What is the point of a compiler
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

A compiler takes all of the files and compiles them into the comand prompt so your server can run the files.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the point of a compiler

item.title: What is the point of a compiler
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

do any of you actually know what the hell your talking about? google compile plz.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the point of a compiler

item.title: What is the point of a compiler
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

xub3rh4x0r:

What is the point of a compiler and i think mines messed up it says “3 errors press and key to continue” on mine can i get a code to get another on…and what is the point of haveing one what do they do.

LMAO Because it does this thing called “compiling”… It makes it possible to run your server… And if you didn’t have it you would be compiling manually with your command prompt…

Read full topic
item.source: What is the point of a compiler

item.title: What is the point of a compiler
item.dc:creator: @run run
item.description:
@run wrote:

compilers make it possible to run your server, they detect changes and load them pretty much, without one you can’t run your server.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the point of a compiler

item.title: What is the point of a compiler
item.dc:creator: @Krew_Kid Krew Kid
item.description:
@Krew_Kid wrote:

Basically a compiler is a batch file used to update your server after you have made changes.(in simple terms)

And there is nothing wrong with your compiler if it has errors. That just means that something somewhere isnt working properly.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the point of a compiler
